label: Proton Lifetime tau_p
wl_code: With[{mPl = 1.22*10^19, alphaGUT = 1/24, roots = 288, s = 2.125, b3 = 24}, mGUT = mPl*(163/roots); tau = (mGUT^4 * alphaGUT^2) / (roots^5) * s * b3; N[tau, 2]]
note: alphaGUT = 1/24 (CHI/6), M_GUT = M_Pl*(163/288), linear S = 2.125, tau_p ~ 8.15e34 years (Hyper-K testable)
